prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with sharp, angular features and a rugged appearance.
Show me a powerful Pokemon that embodies both strength and defense in battle.
Generate a Pokemon that uses its horn to dig through the ground and create tunnels.
Imagine a Pokemon known for its resilience in rocky terrains and mountainous regions.
Design a Pokemon that can withstand extreme conditions and has a sturdy build.
Give me a Pokemon that features a blend of earth tones and striking spikes.
Make a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature into a massive powerhouse.
